message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
Alice, my turn. I think a 60/40 split is more fair this time.  The value of the money decreases for both of us as we wait.
Bob, time is running out. I'll take $55, you get $45.  Let's close this deal before it's worth even less for me!
